overview: Life for Ovie (25) has always been a hustle, he has finished school but he is struggling to get a job, but he continues to thrive with a smile on his face and a natural ability to make people laugh, He is also good-hearted and always willing to help but still filled with that strength, resilience and indomitable Warri spirit to survive against all odds, One morning, his father passes away in his sleep.
title: The Stand Up
